title: Sorcery was supposed to be primary mages tree. What mage will use Nimbus Cloak?
body:
I feel like Sorcery tree will be useless as primary tree now. Keestones for Mages were already useless, for most there was no difference if you took Aery or Comet and they both become worthless in late game when you teamfight. With Ulti Hat getting moved Mages will just go Electrosute and maybe Sorcery second if not abandon it altogether. 
Seriously, what mage could and would use Nimbus Cloak? Maybe {{champion:245}} , {{champion:112}} , {{champion:131}} ? 
It will be useless on most mages as their ultimates either immobilise them, are super long range or are used as execute skill.

replies.body:
I don't think Nimbus will be usefull on Ahri. She doesn't need more move speed after casting R because she usually get some from her passive either way. Besides Nimbus will proc probably only once not 3 times (every R cast).

I don't know how it will interact with Fiddle as he has to channel his R for 1.5s and Nimbus lasts for 2s after casting ult. Does it mean he will only get 0.5s of movement speed?

While I agree some other champs may use it and benefit from this I'm very worried about mages. What should they take in runes now? Domination primary? There aren't a lot of runes they can use as they mostly deal AoE dmg so healing is useless, they don't roam so movement speed is bad. Sudden impact is bad as they are ususally immoblie.

It will probably work like new Essence Reaver where the timer starts after you stop moving (or in the case of Essence Reaver after the first auto). If not I don't see WHY it wouldn't be changed to this if the rune didn't already on PBE. Don't know. Haven't tested yet.

Also, most mages that primary down sorcery take MFB in the tier anyway. It IS the better rune on most mages.

Zoe probably won't like Nimbus Cloak cuz its a 2 second speed up and her ultimate roots her for 1 second (unless Rito balances that by making her get a speed up after she returns to her starting point), and Nimbus Cloak has a 25 sec CD which means it really won't work on her well. Cho who would have loved Hat won't make much use for Nimbus, Eve is in a similar boat, she may like Nimbus for her R if it doesn't kill her target, Fiora is kinda in a strange boat, she'll like the speed but she also likes the CD, Leblanc will like both, Kalista likes both, Katarina totally prefers Hat, Lux prefers Hat, Lucian loves Nimbus but also liked Hat, Malph is a Hat guy, Mao is a hat guy, Zyra likes Hat not Nimbus, Zil Hat, Ziggs Hat, Xerath Hat, Wu either, WW Hat, Voli either, Vayne either probably likes Nimbus, Varus Hat, Urgot Hat, TF either, Twitch Hat, Trundle either, Trist Hat, Thresh Hat, Teemo Hat, etc...

"Sorcery was supposed to be primary mages tree"

Rune paths were not created for specific roles. Riot has been very clear about this ever since the release of runes reforged. Sorcery is defined as a path that "empowers abilities and resource manipulation".

Everyone has abilities, not just mages.
and mages are predominantly ability based. How is that rocket science?
_Everyone has abilities, not just mages._

"Sorcery is defined as a path that "empowers abilities and resource manipulation"

and OP said "Sorcery was supposed to be primary mages tree"

They are the same thing. He did not state that sorcery was only meant for mages, rather that it is designed to empower abilities which mages predominately have. Therefore any keystone in the path should benefit mages if it were to empower their abilities. Nimbus cloak fails to do so. Hardly any mage would benefit from this than what it could have benefited from ultimate hat. Btw riot has if anything, made runes simpler and easier so newer players have an easy time. If anything, rito has limited different builds after the introduction of rune reforged.
